20/* Written by Jim Meyering */
21
22#ifndef CYCLE_CHECK_H
23# define CYCLE_CHECK_H 1
24
25# if HAVE_INTTYPES_H
26# include <inttypes.h>
27# endif
28# if HAVE_STDINT_H
29# include <stdint.h>
30# endif
31# include <stdbool.h>
32# include "dev-ino.h"
33
34struct cycle_check_state
35{
36 struct dev_ino dev_ino;
37 uintmax_t chdir_counter;
38 int magic;
39};
40
41void cycle_check_init (struct cycle_check_state *state);
42bool cycle_check (struct cycle_check_state *state, struct stat const *sb);
43
44#endif
45
